metadata.title: CVE-2022-38227 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: XPDF commit ffaf11c was discovered to contain a stack overflow via __asan_memcpy at asan_interceptors_memintrinsics.cpp.

notes.note: ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
